title: Okabe, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ, R edge
description: five figures approach each other carrying various bundles along a narrow path along a rushing mountain stream; steep hill with trees at R and L; village buildings in middle ground; towering mountain in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
